name: Kung Fu Car
description:
Kung Fu Car has the best graphics and animation in its class. The game play requires superior hand-eye coordination and is loaded with adrenaline and lots of fun.

Enjoy road melting!!!!!!!!!

***************Features****************
★ Gorgeous graphics environment with responsive UI
★ Comes with soothing background theme and music
★ Simple & intuitive gesture controls
★ Enjoy the various challenging modes
★ Share your score on Facebook and Twitter

**** PLAY NOW and rate it FIVE STARS! *****

****************Notes**************
★ Compatible with iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPod Touch 3rd and 4th Generation

Get this game on iTunes© App Store...
